MemberSignature.Value: public static string Escape (string str);
.method public static hidebysig string Escape(string str) cil managed

Docs.summary: Escapes a minimal set of characters (\\, *, +, ?, |, {, [, (,), ^, $,., #, and white space) by replacing them with their escape codes. This instructs the regular expression engine to interpret these characters literally rather than as metacharacters.
